Apply Now        Request Information        Events                                                                                 M.S in Public Relations and Corporate Communication          feature subtitle 1          feature text                                Concentrations           Public Relations Management         Corporate and Organizational Communication               In this transformative era in which social and other digital media are redefining the world of communication, companies in nearly every industry require coordinated and ongoing public relations campaigns to achieve their goals. Customer experience, online communities, and social networking have created the need for PR professionals with a very different set of skills than those of their predecessors.   For the public relations industry, the greatest challenge today is the dearth of new talent—the demand for PR professionals is growing faster than the talent pool. According to the Public Relations Society of America, spending on public relations increased substantially in 2010, and is forecast to go up to $8.1 billion over the next five years.       That’s why the M.S in Public Relations and Corporate Communication is so critical. Through this program and its innovative curriculum, we are teaching and are graduating high-caliber students who will satisfy the increasing demand for PR professionals. These individuals must be well versed in industry trends and must be able to apply new technology and new methods of communication to develop and to implement effective public relations plans.             Program Locations : NYU Midtown Center , Online             View General Curriculum            Learn More            NYU School of Professional Studies faculty and staff members look forward to learning more about you, and we want you to learn more about us, to ensure that your decisions regarding your educational experience are well informed. Our admissions staff is here to partner with you throughout the admissions process. Please do not hesitate to contact us .                   Ready to Proceed?
